原始数据.标题: A Social Network for A.I. Bots Only. No Humans Allowed.
原始数据.内容: A new website called Moltbook has become the talk of Silicon Valley and a Rorschach test for belief in the state of artificial intelligence.

原始数据.标题: These AI notetaking devices can help you record and transcribe your meetings
原始数据.内容: These physical notetakers transcribe audio and give users summaries and action items of meetings using AI. Some even offer live translation.
How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?

原始数据.标题: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
原始数据.内容: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

原始数据.标题: Shedding light on Iran’s longest internet blackout
